ygData.subject: Re: SoW vs. Accelerando conflict
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe not =(.  When I thought about this a moment more I realized that the Spirit of Wolf is a beneficial buff.  So it may not be canceled out.  I will give
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe not =(. When I thought about this a moment more
I realized that the Spirit of Wolf is a 'beneficial'
buff. So it may not be canceled out. I will give it
a try and if any of you do as well please let me know.

==Maravana
==Mithanieal Marr

--- Jukeboxie the Bard <jukeboxie@...> wrote:
> From: "Jukeboxie the Bard" <jukeboxie@...>
>
>
> Doh! Of course.
>
> -Juke
>
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] SoW vs. Accelerando conflict
> >Date: Wed, 1 Sep 1999 14:59:18 -0700 (PDT)
> >
> >Use Alenia's Disenchanting Melody to cancel?
> >
> >--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> wrote:
> > > From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> > >
> > > At 07:23 PM 9/1/99 +0000, "Jukeboxie the Bard"
> > > <jukeboxie@...> wrote:
> > >
> > > <snip story about SoW overriding Accelerando>
> > >
> > > >If it's been like this for a while, sorry. It's
> > > just that I seem to remember
> > > >that Accelerando used to override SoW, not the
> > > other way around (you would
> > > >still have the SoW icon, but you'd run at
> > > Accelerando speed and get the
> > > >"Your feet move faster" message).
> > >
> > > Well, I hate to say it, and I know there's gonna
> be
> > > a bunch more deaths as
> > > a result of this, but I'm glad they implemented
> this
> > > change. Sure, it
> > > nerfs our ability to help our teammates - but
> these
> > > are the same teammates
> > > who were upset that we were overriding their SoW
> > > before during emergency
> > > peelouts.
